text: Rubén Bonifaz Nuño (12 November 1923 - 31 January 2013)Muere el poeta Rubén Bonifaz Nuño at El Universal.com was a Mexican poet and classical scholar. Nuño was born on 12 November 1923 in Córdoba, Veracruz, Mexico. He studied at National Autonomous University of Mexico. Nuño died on 31 January 2013 in Mexico City, Mexico from natural causes, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== *Rubén Bonifaz Nuño (El Colegio Nacional) *Rubén Bonifaz Nuño: Brief biography *Rubén Bonifaz Nuño: Interview, biography, criticism, poetry Category:1923 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Mexican poets Category:People from Veracruz
title: Rubén Bonifaz Nuño
